name: Chef
body:
### Brian Adams - Chef Recipes and other interesting things.

### Resume: [BrianAdams2014.doc](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1q-RL4tgkBIWrQrwWDWJty9hAYbglxQX6y7ToVeGZ4Kk/edit?usp=sharing)

## Little bit about me:
Linux Administrator I at Rackspace with aspirations of getting into the wonderful world of DevOps! Always have a project to be working on and always trying to improve methodology for developing script. Really dig DevOps teams with a desire to grow, collaborate, and teach to those who are passionate about learning what it takes, documenting it forward, ~~and possibly know the cure for a slight caffeine addiction.~~

###Recipes I've built: 

```
lsync
tf2server
newrelic 
``````
